name: bananadoh
description:
bananadoh is an action puzzle featuring a truck that has lost its bananas. Rotate tiles in order to keep the truck on the road as it journeys through a colorful game world, and relish in the fruits of your high-score.

bananadoh features a range of unlockable tiles and pickups, and every level is procedurally generated ensuring a unique experience each time you play. banandoh is free to play on the web, iOS App Store and Google Play.
